Package de.dfki.lt.mary.modules

All the modules doing the actual processing.

MaryModule A generic interface for Mary Modules.

Package de.dfki.lt.mary.modules Description

All the modules doing the actual processing. The communication with the main program is defined by the MaryModule interface. All pure Java modules extend InternalModule; all external modules are called by subclasses of ExternalModule.
